name: Plant-2020| World Congress on Plant Science and Molecular Biology| Massive Sci Group Conferences
content: Dear Colleague, I'm honoured to invite you as a speaker in World Congress on Plant Science and Molecular Biology in LONDON UK, an organizing Conference happening on June 17-19, 2020 in LONDON UK. The Conference emphasis mainly on the theme “New challenges and advanced techniques in the arena of Plant Science and Molecular Biology”. Plant -2020 Organizing Committee anticipates 500 speakers from 50 Countries. We would like to inform you that 6 International Plant Science and Molecular Biology association Presidents are attending as key note speakers. For more details please visit: http://massivegroup.org/plant-science-conference/ Best Regards, Jim Anderson. Email: plant@massivegroup.org plant@massivegroup.info
